qrList.label: init
qrList.message:
/echo Initializing | /if left={{lastMessageId}} right=0 rule=neq "/abort" | /echo May freeze momentarily, please wait | /delay 100 | /setvar key=girlname Default | /setvar key=usergridcolor #2d4d4f | /setvar key=chargridcolor #462b3c | /setvar key=hitgridcolor #bb2147 | /setvar key=missgridcolor #8a9396 | /setvar key=board user | /setvar key=chartargetcount 0 | /setvar key=gameover false | /setvar qrList.label: initgrid
qrList.message:
/getvar index={{getvar::i}} numtogrid | /setvar key=grid | /setvar key=userboard index={{getvar::i}} | /setvar key=charboard index={{getvar::i}} | /addvar key=userboardhtml
{{pipe}}
| /addvar key=charboardhtml
{{getvar::grid}}
| /addvar key=i 1

qrList.label: userprocess
qrList.message:
/setvar key=userinput {{input}} |
/setvar key=jbout - |

/if left=gameover right=true rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=jbout NOBODY is playing yet, so avoid writing anyone losing clothes. Include the following code block at the end of the response to resume the game: ```
RESUME GAME
``` |

/if left={{lastMessageId}} right=0 rule=eq "/run battlestripsv2.getuserinfo \|
/setvar key=jbout Write a vivid introduction scene ONLY for the girl, and then include her info in the code block: ```
Name: Her name
Description: Her description
Clothes: Her list of clothes in array form. Always include her underwear. Example: [black crop top, skinny jeans, canvas shoes, black bra, black panties]
```
NOBODY is playing yet, so avoid writing anyone losing clothes." |

/if left={{lastMessageId}} right=2 rule=eq "/run battlestripsv2.getgirlinfo" |
/if left=validgirlinfo right=false rule=eq "/echo Her info is invalid or incomplete \| /setvar key=blocktrigger true" |

/run battlestripsv2.resumegame |

/if left=battle right=true rule=eq "/run battlestripsv2.battleloop \| /setvar key=battle false" |

/flushvar nadanada

qrList.label: Send
qrList.message: /run battlestripsv2.userprocess | /if left=blocktrigger right=true rule=eq else="/send {{getvar::userinput}}{{newline}}{{pipe}} \| /trigger" "/setvar key=blocktrigger false" | /flushvar nadanada | /setinput

qrList.label: dispboard
battleloop
qrList.message:
/setvar key=looping true |

/while left=looping right=true rule=eq "/run battlestripsv2.dispboard"

qrList.label: validateinput
qrList.message:
/setvar key=startregex (?=[a-e][1-5]) |
/setvar key=endregex (?<=[a-e][1-5]) |
/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{getvar::tmpinputgrid}} |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=inputgrid |

/setvar key=varname inputgrid |
/run creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq "/echo Invalid input \| /abort" |

/getvar index={{getvar::inputgrid}} gridtonum |
/setvar key=inputgrid |

/run battlestripsv2.playerturn |
/setvar key=userlast {{getvar::tmpinputgrid}}

qrList.label: playerturn
qrList.message:
/if left=board right=user rule=eq else="/setvar key=namedisp {{user}} \| /setvar key=namedisp2 {{getvar::girlname}}" "/setvar key=namedisp {{getvar::girlname}} \| /setvar key=namedisp2 {{user}}" |

/pass {{getvar::board}}board |
/getvar index={{getvar::inputgrid}} {{pipe}} | /setvar key=gridlabel |

/if left=misshit right=gridlabel rule=in "/echo The target grid has already been selected. \| /abort" |

/if left="{{getvar::board}}targets" right=gridlabel rule=in else="/echo {{getvar::namedisp}} missed \|
/setvar key=class MISS"
"/echo severity=warning {{getvar::namedisp}} sunk one of {{getvar::namedisp2}}'s clothes \|
/setvar key=class HIT \|
/run battlestripsv2.hitplayer \|
/setvar key=looping false" |

/setvar key="{{getvar::board}}board" index={{getvar::inputgrid}} {{getvar::class}} |

/setvar key=regexflags gi |
/setvar key=regex \b{{getvar::board}}{{getvar::inputgrid}}\b\|\b{{getvar::tmpinputgrid}}\b |
/setvar key=toreplace {{getvar::class}} |
/pass {{getvar::board}}boardhtml |
/getvar {{pipe}} |
/regex name=regexreplace |
/setvar key="{{getvar::board}}boardhtml" |

/if left=board right=user rule=eq else="/setvar key=board user" "/setvar key=board char"

qrList.label: charselecttarget
qrList.message:
/getvar index={{getvar::chartargetcount}} charshots | /setvar key=tmpinputgrid |

/getvar index={{getvar::tmpinputgrid}} gridtonum |
/setvar key=inputgrid |

/run battlestripsv2.playerturn |

/addvar key=chartargetcount 1 |
/setvar key=charlast {{getvar::tmpinputgrid}}

qrList.label: getgirlinfo
qrList.message:
/echo Setting up her grids, please wait |
/delay 100 |
/setvar key=toadd char |
/setvar key=validgirlinfo true |
/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{lastMessage}} |
/setvar key=endregex (\n[\S\s]+?[:\-]\s\|\n(?<=[\S\s]+?[:\-][\S\s]+)```) |

/setvar key=startregex name\s?[:\-]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=girlname |
/setvar key=varname girlname |
/run creamsan.isvardefined | /setvar key=validgirlinfo |
/if left=validgirlinfo right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex description\s?[:\-]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=girldesc |
/setvar key=varname girldesc |
/run creamsan.isvardefined | /setvar key=validgirlinfo |
/if left=validgirlinfo right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex clothes\s?[:\-]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=girlclothesraw |
/setvar key=varname girlclothesraw |
/run creamsan.isvardefined | /setvar key=validgirlinfo |
/if left=validgirlinfo right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/run battlestripsv2.gentargets

qrList.label: getuserinfo
qrList.message:
/echo Setting up your grids, please wait |
/delay 100 |
/setvar key=toadd user |
/run battlestripsv2.gentargets

qrList.label: gentargets
qrList.message:
/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{lastMessage}} |
/setvar key=startregex \[\s*"?\s* |
/setvar key=endregex (,\s*"?\|\s*"?\s*\]) |
/run creamsan.shuffle | /setvar key=targetsbase |

/setvar key=i 0 |
/setvar key=looping true |
/while left=looping right=true rule=eq "/run battlestripsv2.addtarget" |

/if left=toadd right=user rule=eq else="/echo {{getvar::girlname}}'s grids have been successfully generated." "/echo Your grids have been successfully generated."

qrList.label: addtarget
qrList.message:
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=clothing |
/setvar key=varname clothing |
/run creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq "/setvar key=looping false \| /abort" |

/flushvar toreplace |
/setvar key=regex \[[^,]+?\]\|(?<=\[\s*){{getvar::clothing}},\s* |
/setvar key=regexflags i |
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::tomsgprocess}} |
/setvar key=tomsgprocess |

/setvar key="{{getvar::toadd}}clothes" index={{getvar::i}} {{getvar::clothing}} |
/getvar index={{getvar::i}} targetsbase |
/setvar key="{{getvar::toadd}}targets" index={{getvar::i}} |

/if left=toadd right=user rule=eq "/setvar key=regex {{pipe}} \|
/setvar key=toreplace {{pipe}}ðŸ›¥ï¸ \|
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::userboardhtml}} \|
/setvar key=userboardhtml" |

/addvar key=i 1

qrList.label: hitplayer
qrList.message:
/setvar key=topopidx 0 |
/pass {{getvar::board}}clothes |
/getvar {{pipe}} |
/setvar key=arr |
/run creamsan.pop |
/setvar key="{{getvar::board}}clothes" |
/setvar key=clothes |
/setvar key=clothing {{getvar::popval}} |
/setvar key=jbout - After some exchange of shots, with a few misses here and there, {{getvar::namedisp}} sinks one of {{getvar::namedisp2}}'s clothes at grid coordinate {{getvar::tmpinputgrid}}.
- {{getvar::namedisp2}}'s {{getvar::clothing}} magically disappears.
- {{getvar::namedisp2}}'s remaining clothing: {{getvar::clothes}}
- Vividly narrate this scene and {{getvar::girlname}}'s reaction. |

/setvar key=varname clothes |
/run creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq "/run battlestripsv2.announcewinner"

qrList.label: announcewinner
qrList.message:
/setvar key=gameover true |
/echo severity=warning {{getvar::namedisp}} wins! |
/setvar key=jbout {{getvar::jbout}}
- {{getvar::namedisp2}} has no more clothes remaining.
- {{getvar::namedisp}} is the winner.

qrList.label: giveup
qrList.message:
/setvar key=looping false |
/setvar key=gameover true |
/echo severity=error Game over |
/setvar key=jbout - {{user}} gives up.
- All his clothes magically disappear.
- {{getvar::girlname}} is the winner.

qrList.label: resumegame
qrList.message:
/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{lastMessage}} |
/setvar key=startregex ```\s* |
/setvar key=endregex \s*``` |
/run creamsan.regextract |
/if left={{pipe}} right="resume game" rule=in "/setvar key=battle true"
